abstractText: In 1998 two programs were developed to address aquatic and riparian monitoring needs throughout the upper Columbia River Basin. These programs include; (Pacific Anadromous Fish Strategy (PACFISH) and Inland Fish Strategy (INFISH) This method was derived from a PACFISH/INFISH riparian sampling protocol and includes instructions for describing the vegetation and ground cover in the riparian area.
title: Riparian Cross-Sections v1.0
